features.name: Real-time Attendance Tracking
features.description: Provides a single, accurate, real-time view of workforce attendance, performance, and productivity.

features.name: Automated Shift Scheduling
features.description: Automatically generates shift schedules based on employee availability, skill sets, and staffing requirements.
use_cases: Staffing healthcare shifts based on patient needs
features.technical_details: Supports shift cut-off, rotation, and on-call tracking

features.name: Mobile Geofencing and Geotagging
features.description: Restricts attendance marking to defined geographic areas and tracks precise locations via GPS.
features.technical_details: GPS-enabled, available on Android and iOS

features.name: Advanced Biometric Authentication
features.description: Supports facial recognition, fingerprint, and RFID to ensure accurate time recording and prevent fraud.

features.name: Contactless Health Screening
features.description: Integrates mask detection, temperature detection, and thermal scanning into biometric devices.

features.name: Integrated Payroll Synchronization
features.description: Seamlessly pushes attendance, absence, and leave data directly to payroll systems like ADP Vista.
features.technical_details: Integrates with ADP Vista and ERPs

features.name: Project-Based Timesheets
features.description: Captures accurate time tracking data against specific clients, projects, and activities.
use_cases: IT services billing clients for hours

features.name: Overtime Management
features.description: Automates overtime calculation based on business rules and provides alerts for approaching limits.
use_cases: Alerting managers before staff hit overtime
Applying specific overtime rules per location

features.name: Leave Management
features.description: Enables on-the-go leave application and approval with customizable workflow policies.
use_cases: Employee applying for sick leave via mobile

features.name: Tablet Kiosk App
features.description: Allows multiple employees to authenticate and mark attendance on a single shared tablet device.

features.name: Front Camera Self-Validation
features.description: Requires employees to take a photo (selfie) when punching in via mobile to validate identity.

features.name: Role-Based Analytics Dashboards
features.description: Provides customizable views and reports tailored to different roles within the organization.

features.name: Employee Engagement Tools
features.description: Includes features for surveys, asking HR questions, and expense management within the platform.

features.name: Compliance Management
features.description: Automates adherence to labor laws regarding work hours, breaks, and overtime rules.

features.name: Cloud Infrastructure Security
features.description: Hosted on AWS with multi-factor authentication and role-based access control for data protection.
features.technical_details: AWS Cloud, MFA, Federated Identity Management

benefits.headline: Eliminate payroll leakage and time fraud
benefits.description: Stops unauthorized payments caused by 'buddy punching,' ghost employees, and manual errors through biometric authentication and real-time cross-referencing, directly recovering lost revenue.
proof_points: Time fraud can cost up to 5% of gross payroll
Reduce time tracking errors by 30% on average
Prevents payment for unworked time (e.g., 10 mins late daily = 1 week paid/year)
benefits.business_impact: Direct reduction in gross payroll costs and prevention of financial loss due to fraud.

benefits.headline: Gain total visibility over distributed and mobile teams
benefits.description: Provides a single, real-time view of workforce productivity across 1,000+ locations, enabling management of remote, field, and on-premise employees regardless of where they work.
proof_points: Tracks full-time, part-time, contract, gig, and contingent employees
benefits.business_impact: Optimized resource allocation and improved accountability for remote/field staff.

benefits.headline: Automate complex scheduling and reduce administrative burden
benefits.description: Replaces time-consuming manual rostering with automated, demand-based scheduling that handles complex shift rotations, availability, and skills matching, freeing up managers for higher-value tasks.
proof_points: Clients rated ADP SecurTime 4 out of 5 stars
benefits.business_impact: Increased operational efficiency and reduced HR administrative overhead.

benefits.headline: Ensure regulatory compliance and mitigate legal risk
benefits.description: Automatically applies labor laws, overtime rules, and leave policies specific to individual locations and business types, ensuring audit readiness and preventing non-compliance penalties.
proof_points: Helps adhere to labour laws and regulations
Managers only approve time, not calculate hours/rules
benefits.business_impact: Avoidance of costly legal penalties and labor disputes.

benefits.headline: Streamline payroll processing with accurate, real-time data
benefits.description: Eliminates manual data entry and calculation errors by integrating attendance data directly with payroll systems, ensuring employees are paid accurately and on time.
supporting_features: Seamless conversion of work time to paychecks
benefits.business_impact: Faster payroll cycles and reduced employee grievances regarding pay.

benefits.headline: Enhance workplace safety with contactless technology
benefits.description: Supports health and safety protocols through touchless biometric options and health screening features, ensuring a hygienic environment for on-premise staff.
benefits.business_impact: Improved business continuity and employee well-being.

benefits.headline: Scale operations cost-effectively without infrastructure overhaul
benefits.description: Allows businesses to expand workforce management capabilities using cloud technology and existing devices (BYOD) or integrations, avoiding heavy upfront capital expenditures.
proof_points: Get on-cloud without additional investments to infrastructure
Avoid huge capex for small delivery centers
benefits.business_impact: Lower Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) and high scalability.

top_benefits: Eliminate payroll leakage and time fraud
Gain total visibility over distributed and mobile teams
Automate complex scheduling and reduce administrative burden
Ensure regulatory compliance and mitigate legal risk
Streamline payroll processing with accurate, real-time data

use_cases.title: Dynamic Shift Scheduling for Manufacturing
use_cases.scenario: Manufacturing plants managing a mix of full-time, part-time, and rotating shift workers, often needing to fill vacancies at short notice.
use_cases.problem_solved: Complicated, time-consuming manual scheduling, difficulty filling sudden vacancies, and ensuring the right skills are present on the production line.
use_cases.solution_approach: Automated shift scheduling based on employee availability, skill sets, and preferences, with features to handle shift rotations.

use_cases.title: Remote Workforce Tracking for Logistics
use_cases.scenario: Transport and logistics companies managing drivers, dispatchers, and support staff across 1,000+ distributed locations or on the road.
use_cases.problem_solved: Inability to verify precise arrival/departure times at depots, lack of visibility into driver locations, and difficulty managing mobile workforce attendance.
use_cases.solution_approach: Utilization of a mobile app with GPS-enabled tracking to record precise locations and times of arrivals/departures.

use_cases.title: Multi-Location Retail Attendance Management
use_cases.scenario: Retail chains with multiple store locations in a city where staff may move between departments or stores.
use_cases.problem_solved: Attendance overlap between nearby stores, ensuring staff are physically present at the assigned store, and disruption to customer service due to absence.
use_cases.solution_approach: Implementation of employee-to-store mapping with geofencing that only captures attendance when the employee is within the specific store's perimeter.
expected_outcomes: Ensured store coverage and customer service continuity

use_cases.title: Contactless Attendance and Rostering for Healthcare
use_cases.scenario: Hospitals and healthcare facilities managing doctors, nurses, and support staff with complex 24/7 shift patterns and strict hygiene requirements.
use_cases.problem_solved: Risk of infection transmission via touch-based devices, managing complex day/night shift balances, and tracking on-call doctor visits.
use_cases.solution_approach: Deploying contactless biometric devices (facial recognition, thermal scanning) and automated rostering tools for complex shifts.

use_cases.title: Project-Based Time Tracking for Billing
use_cases.scenario: IT and professional services firms where employees work on specific client projects, often requiring billable hours tracking.
use_cases.problem_solved: Inaccurate client billing, difficulty tracking time spent on specific projects versus general tasks, and managing overtime costs.
use_cases.solution_approach: Granular time tracking that captures data against specific clients, projects, and activities to ensure accurate invoicing.

use_cases.title: Field Force Verification for Financial Services
use_cases.scenario: Banking and financial institutions with a large workforce of collection and sales agents visiting customers in dispersed locations.
use_cases.problem_solved: Ensuring agents are physically present at client locations during designated hours and optimizing travel routes.
use_cases.solution_approach: GPS-based geo-tagging to validate employee presence at specific coordinates and location-based reporting.

use_cases.title: Payroll Compliance and Fraud Prevention
use_cases.scenario: Organizations of any size struggling with time theft, 'buddy punching', ghost employees, and complex overtime calculation rules.
use_cases.problem_solved: Financial loss due to time fraud (estimated 5% of gross payroll), ghost employees, and non-compliance with labor laws regarding overtime.
use_cases.solution_approach: Biometric validation to prevent proxy attendance combined with automated overtime rule application integrated directly with payroll.
expected_outcomes: Elimination of time fraud and ghost employees

use_cases.title: Construction Site Workforce Management
use_cases.scenario: Construction companies managing diverse workforces (contract, gig, full-time) across remote job sites with manual processes.
use_cases.problem_solved: Difficulty juggling diverse schedules, tracking hours accurately in remote areas, and ensuring regulatory adherence for non-tech-savvy employees.
use_cases.solution_approach: Mobile-first tracking with simple interfaces for non-tech users, supporting offline capabilities and compliance tracking.

primary_use_cases: Contactless Attendance and Rostering for Healthcare

differentiators.explanation: Allows organizations to modernize attendance tracking without ripping and replacing existing hardware investments.
evidence: We can integrate the devices you’re already using
partners... help our clients adopt cloud-based time attendance systems without replacing current biometric systems

differentiators.explanation: Single platform capability to manage every type of employment contract simultaneously, which is often fragmented in other systems.
evidence: Track and manage your full-time, part-time, contract, gig and contingent employees real-time
Employee group-based policies to track contract employees

differentiators.explanation: Native integration ensures data flows directly to payroll without manual intervention or third-party connectors.
evidence: ADP SecurTime and ADP Vista Payroll. Best together.
Accurate, secure, real-time attendance, absence and leave data direct to payroll

differentiators.explanation: Utilizes specific device-level and biometric validation to prevent 'buddy punching' and proxy attendance in remote/mobile workforces.
evidence: Leveraging IMEI number tagging... prevents proxy
Mobile app allows only one person to authenticate themselves using a single device

differentiators.explanation: Integrates health compliance directly into the access/attendance hardware.
evidence: Advanced biometric capabilities such as mask detection, temperature detection and thermal scanning

unique_capabilities: IMEI number tagging to prevent mobile proxy attendance
Retrofit capability to convert existing biometric devices to cloud-based systems
Integrated mask detection and thermal scanning within attendance hardware
Specific 'On-call tracking' for healthcare doctor visits beyond shift times
Shift cut-off logic to distinguish prior day night shifts from current day shifts
Mobile app with geofence specifically marketed to avoid CapEx for small delivery centers
competitive_analysis.market_position: End-to-end, cloud-based workforce management solution specifically designed for complex, distributed (1,000+ locations), and hybrid workforces (gig/contract/FTE) with a focus on compliance and fraud prevention.
competitive_advantages: Reduction of time tracking errors by 30%
Ability to handle complex compliance requirements across different geographies and worker types
Real-time visibility into labor costs and overtime before they occur

notes: Documentation mentions a 'Pay-as-you-go' model that allows scaling as needed.
Mentions 'flexible plans' and 'SLA-based low-cost remote support model'.
Prospective clients must schedule a customised demo or call 1800-420-4242.
